name: HapeCollect
description:
If you're looking forward to the release of HAPEBEAST, relax with a game of HAPECOLLECT and collect some bananas!!!! :D

Many contribute their part in the community through drawings or poems. Since I'm an absolute nit at both and I noticed that no one or only a few program anything, I thought I'd program a little game for the community and this project. It's the first time I programmed a 2d game, normally I program more functional. That's why I had to put in a few more hours here, but I'm happy with the work and hope you find this a cool idea and play 1-2 rounds of HAPECOLLECT :)

By @NoelW or @NoelW#5532
